endpoints.description: Submit data to predict future energy demand based on the provided parameters and data.
Retrieve information about the machine learning models used for predictions, including version and features.
Upload new environmental data to refine the predictive model's accuracy and comprehensiveness.
Access historical energy demand data for analysis and reference.
Remove unnecessary or outdated datasets from the service database.
Obtain insights and resources for efficient energy resource planning.
Mark and comment on forecast results to improve the learning process of the models.
Retrieve statistics on service usage and performance metrics.
Modify the characteristics of existing demand profiles used in predictions.
Analyze energy demand trends across different geographical areas using multidimensional filtering.
